original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. translated: A visible phenomenon …🔽A visible phenomenon …🔽A visible phenomenon …

translated: and non-visible-non-impinging dhammas.🔽From a non-visible-non-impinging dhamma arises a non-visible-non-impinging dhamma through a root-condition.

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati  hetu paccayā na a nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ
translated: From a non-visible-non-impinging dhamma arises a visible-impinging dhamma through a root-condition.🔽From a non-visible-non-impinging dhamma arises a non-visible-impinging dhamma through a root-condition.

original: hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho

translated: From a non-visible-non-impinging dhamma arises a visible-impinging dhamma and a non-visible-non-impinging dhamma through a root-condition.

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: and three ideas.🔽With a non-visible non-impacting idea as condition, a non-visible non-impacting idea arises, by way of root-cause condition.
